Meet Mark Achee
Spouse

Children
Christine (17) Mark Jr. (14) and Michelle (6)
Very Brief Testimony
Favorite Book of the Bible and Why
Proverbs-for the many life applications that are straight to the point.
Favorite Verse and Why
Psalm 118:24-The Lord made each day, The Lord is love... Let us rejoice!
Favorite Book (besides the Bible) and Why
On being a servant of God. Jesus came to serve, not to be served, and this book reflects, challenges and encourages us to do just that in a very awesome way.
Who do you most admire (besides Jesus)
Billy Graham
What do you do at Calvary
To encourage, teach and try and lead by example of being a humble servant of Jesus Christ. I am an Elder, Children's' Ministry Teacher, Usher, Overseer, and Seasoned Saints Leader.
Mail me at mark.achee@sous.com
